titles.title: To amend title 54, United States Code, to authorize the provision of technical assistance under the Preserve America Program and to direct the Secretary of the Interior to enter into partnerships with communities adjacent to units of the National Park System to leverage local cultural heritage tourism assets.
Explore America Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
